alice.tuprologx.ide

Interface IDE

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TheoryTabbedPane

    interface IDE
    A common interface to an IDE. This interface is not public, since it is intended for internal use, and could be subject to several changes in future releases.
    Version:
    1.0 - 1-gen-03
    Author:
    Giulio Piancastelli

    • Method Detail

      • enableTheoryCommands

        void enableTheoryCommands(boolean flag)
        Enable or disable theory-related commands.
        Parameters:
        flag - true if the commands have to be enabled, false otherwise.

      • isFeededTheory

        boolean isFeededTheory()
        Check if the theory contained in the edit area of the IDE has been feeded to the engine.
        Returns:
        true if the current theory has been feeded to the engine, false otherwise.

      • setFeededTheory

        void setFeededTheory(boolean flag)
        Set the status of the theory contained in the edit area of the IDE.
        Parameters:
        flag - true if the theory has been feeded to the engine, false otherwise.

      • getEditorContent

        java.lang.String getEditorContent()
        Get the content of the IDE's editor.
        Returns:
        the content of the edit area in the IDE's editor.

      • setEditorContent

        void setEditorContent(java.lang.String text)
        Set the content of the IDE's editor.
